{{Infobox Embedded System |image1 = Aerohive HiveAP 320.jpg |image1_size = 150px |caption = Aerohive AP320 802.11n Wireless Access Point |caption2 = <!-- 2nd tagleine --> |pp = http://www.aerohive.com/products/access-points/additional-access-points/ap320 |sp = <!-- Support page url only --> |dl = <!-- Download page url only --> |wikidevi = Aerohive_HiveAP_320 |wikipedia = <!-- [[wikipedia:Main Page|Wikipedia]] Leave blank for none --> |ddwrtsupport = <!-- Activation, Donation, Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, TBD, Unofficially, WIP --> |openwrtsupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |tomatosupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |gargoylesupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, -->
|brand = Aerohive |model = HiveAP 320 |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = <!-- SubModel number, Leave blank for unknown --> |revision = <!-- Model Revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = AH-AP-320-N-FCC |wlclass = AN600 |series = HiveAP |type = enterprise access point |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = WBV-HIVEAP320,WBV-HIVEAP320DFS |icid = 7774A-HIVEAP320 |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = <!-- Board Identification, Leave blank for none --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Cavium;CN5020; |cpu1_cores = 2 |cpu1_type = MIPS64 |cpu1_type_rev = OCTEON Plus |cpu1spd = 500 <!-- 300 / 400 / 500 / 600 / 700 MHz --> |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),SPI NOR,NAND,Compact Flash, --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Spansion;S29GL512P11TFI010; |flash1size = 64 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4 --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 512 |ram1chip = Micron;; |ram1_num = 2 |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |eth2chip = Marvell;88E1121R; |lan_ports = 2 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |portbasedvlan = <!-- Support for port based vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |802.1qvlan = <!-- Support for 802.1q vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = 00:19:77 |oui = <!-- Wireless OUI -->
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = Aerohive Boot Loader;1.2.5.24;; |stockos = <!-- Name;Version;Distro -->
|exp_if_types = Mini PCI |exp_minipci_num = 2
|pwr_volt_type = POE |pwr_poe_type = af |pwr_poe = 48 |pwr_poe_amp = 0.625 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = <!-- Outer barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_inner = <!-- Inner barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_len = <!-- Length of barrel --> |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = yes,, RJ45 console,, (9600 8N1) |jtag = yes,, 14-pin header
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = RTC w/ battery backup, enterprise class |addchip = Trusted Platform Module;Atmel;AT97SC3203;;1;,,, 512-Bit Serial RTC;ST Microelectronics;M41T94;;1;,,, 4K-bit 3-Wire Serial EEPROM;Atmel;AT93C66A;;1;,,, Flash based 8-bit CMOS Microcontroller;Microchip;PIC16F916;;1;,,, Flash based 8-bit CMOS Microcontroller;Microchip;PIC16F690;;1;,,, 3V RS232 Transceiver;Maxim Integrated;MAX3232E;;1;,,, 802.3af PoE-PD interface and PWM controller;ST Microelectronics;PM8800A;;1;,,, 16-bit transparent D-type latch;Texas Instruments;SN74LVTH16373;;1;,,, Quadruple 2-Input Positive-And Gate;Texas Instruments;SN74HC08;;1;,,, Dual D-type positive-edge-triggered flip-flop;Texas Instruments;SN74HC74;;2;,,, Dual Channel Active EMI/ESD Suppressor;Akros Silicon;AS1602;;4;,,, 1.5A Low Noise Fast Response LDO Regulator;Linear Technology;LT1963A;;1;,,, Low Voltage Dual D-Type Positive Edge-Triggered Flip-Flop;Fairchild Semiconductor;74LCX74;;1;,,, Hex Inverter with Schmitt Trigger Input;Fairchild Semiconductor;74ACT14;;1;,,, 30V, 4A N-Channel MOSFET;Fairchild Semiconductor;FDFS6N754;;4; |802dot11_protocols = abgn
|defaulip = <!-- ???.???.???.???, default IP Address --> |defaultlogin = admin |defaultpass = aerohive |defaultssid = <!-- default Wireless ID, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |manuf = <!-- Manufacturer --> |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = <!-- Third party firmware official support, AsusWRT-Merlin, CeroWrt, DD-WRT, DD-WRT (kong), DD-WRT (kongac), DD-WRT (kongarm), FreedomBox, FreshTomato-ARM, Gargoyle, LibreWrt, Oleg (wl500g), Oleg-ng (wl500g), OpenWrt, Tomato, Tomato RAF, Tomato (shibby), Tomato (Toastman), TomatoUSB, Wive-NG -->
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = 02/23/2009 |estreldate = <!-- Estimated release date --> |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = B009RP6EPO |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = Taiwan
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1mod = Wistron NeWeb DNMA-83 |rad1modif = Mini PCI |rad1chip1 = Atheros;AR9160; |rad1chip2 = Atheros;AR9106; |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = U.FL |rad1txchains = 3 |rad1rxchains = 3 |rad1sstreams = 2 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11a/b/g/n |rad1n = 300 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1a = 54 |rad1freq = 2.4 or 5
|wi2_if_name = |rad2mod = Wistron NeWeb DNMA-84 |rad2modif = Mini PCI |rad2chip1 = Atheros;AR9160; |rad2chip2 = Atheros;AR9103; |rad2oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad2_ant_conn = U.FL |rad2txchains = 3 |rad2rxchains = 3 |rad2sstreams = 2 |rad2stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |rad2n = 300 |rad2g = 54 |rad2b = 11 |rad2freq = 2.4
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== ===Specifications=== *[http://www.racoindustries.com/aerohive-hiveap-300-access-points-features.htm Specifications - ''HiveAP 300 Series''] on '''RacoIndustries''' *[http://www.btnet.de/pdf/hiveap300.pdf PBrief - ''HiveAP 300 Series''] on '''Aerohive Networks''' :CPU: [[Cavium]] Octeon Plus CN5020 @500MHz 2-cores
